en.title: My Portfolio
en.description: Some of my recent projects I work on privately or publicly.

breachprotocol.io is an online tool that helps Cyberpunk 2077 players solve Breach Protocol puzzles. It uses multi-modal LLMs to analyze screenshots of the puzzle grid and then calculates the most efficient sequence of codes to complete the breach, saving players time and frustration.

private.title: through-the-ages.com
private.shortDescription: Compare before and after photos of iconic places.

en.description: Through the Ages lets you explore the past and present of any location with side-by-side before-and-after photos. Users can upload historical and modern images from the same spot, compare them with an interactive slider, and browse a map of transformations over time. Discover how places evolve and contribute to a growing visual history of the world!

private.title: Blitzerheld
private.shortDescription: Let Alexa warn you of radar-traps.

en.description: SmartCash is your smart companion for personal finance, empowering you to take control of your money effortlessly. With its user-friendly interface, SmartCash provides real-time tracking of your expenses and income, enabling you to identify spending patterns and make informed financial decisions. Stay on top of your budget as SmartCash offers personalized recommendations to save money and achieve your financial goals without compromising your lifestyle.
